text: ma kana li-ahli l-madinati waman hawlahum mina l-aʿrabi an yatakhallafu ʿan rasuli l-lahi wala yarghabu bi-anfusihim ʿan nafsihi dhalika bi-annahum la yusibuhum zama-on wala nasabun wala makhmasatun fi sabili l-lahi wala yatauna mawti-an yaghizu l-kufara wala yanaluna min ʿaduwwin naylan illa kutiba lahum bihi ʿamalun salihun inna l-laha la yudiʿu ajra l-muh'sinina
